## Next.js Restaurant Website - Dining Your Hero,s

This is a modern restaurant website built with Next.js App Router, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.

### Design System
- Primary Green: #0D4D4D
- Primary Orange: #FF6B1A
- Background Cream: #F5EBD7
- Button border-radius: 25-30px (pill shape)
- Image border-radius: 8-12px

### Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion for smooth animations
